Name: Friend ReQuest - A Playable Teaser
About the game: Friend ReQuest - A Playable Teaser is a short character study focusing on a girl named Amity, living in a small rural American town. It is a short, simple, (2D Top Down), life simulator depicting 5 relatively average days of Amity's life and attending high school. Perform daily tasks, do activities in Amity's room, and do favors for NPCs to raise your stats. Maybe you'll make some friends along the way? The rest is yours to discover. Step into her shoes for a while. I wonder where you'll take them? Authors note: Knowledge of the game Persona 5 and its mechanics may enhance the experience. This is a work of fiction and should be treated as such. Those who cannot discern fiction from reality should not partake in this character study. This Character Study is not for children or those who are easily disturbed.
